Floral Basket before Statue of Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here Thursday laid a floral basket before the statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.
 They laid the floral basket before the statue of the President and paid homage in humble reverence for the President who worked all his life for the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people and performed immortal and great exploits in the accomplishment of the cause of world peace and independence.

Russian and Overseas Korean Delegations Here
    Pyongyang, April 15 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans headed by Jong Yong Nam arrived here Thursday to commemorate the Day of the Sun.
 Also arriving was a delegation of the Tynda, Russia, Group for the Study of the Juche Idea headed by Gennadi Astakhov.
